Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.name: preferredLaunchStyle
Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.abstract: preferredLaunchStyle: Gives the ability for a FlowRepresentable to describe how it best shows up. For example a view can claim it preferrs to be launched in a navigationStack

Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.name: workflow
Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.abstract: workflow: Access to the Workflow controlling the FlowRepresentable. A common use case may be a FlowRepresentable that wants to abandon the Workflow it’s in.

Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.name: instance()
Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html#/s:1.abstract: instance: A method to return an instance of the FlowRepresentable

Protocols/Presenter.html#/s:15DynamicWor.name: ViewType
Protocols/Presenter.html#/s:15DynamicWor.abstract: ViewType: The type your presenter deals with (e.g. UIViewController)

Protocols/Presenter.html#/s:15DynamicWor.name: launch(view:from:withLaunchStyle:animated:completion:)
Protocols/Presenter.html#/s:15DynamicWor.abstract: launch: A method to let the presenter know it needs to present a view

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.name: IntakeType
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.abstract: IntakeType: The data type required to be passed to your FlowRepresentable (use Any? if you don’t care)

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.name: shouldLoad(with:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.abstract: shouldLoad: A method indicating whether it makes sense for this view to load in a workflow

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.name: shouldLoad()
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:15Dy.abstract: shouldLoad: A method indicating whether it makes sense for this view to load in a workflow

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.name: FlowRepresentable
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.abstract: FlowRepresentable: A typed version of ‘AnyFlowRepresentable’. Use this on views that you want to add to a workflow.

Protocols/Presenter.html.name: Presenter
Protocols/Presenter.html.abstract: Presenter: Used in the event you want to create your own kind of presenter.

Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html.name: AnyFlowRepresentable
Protocols/AnyFlowRepresentable.html.abstract: AnyFlowRepresentable: A type erased version of ‘FlowRepresentable’. Generally speaking don’t use this directly, use FlowRepresentable instead.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: launchInto(_:args:withLaunchStyle:onFinish:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: launchInto: When using UIKit this is how you launch a workflow

Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.name: default
Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.abstract: default: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow should persist in the viewstack based on it’s shouldLoad function

Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.name: hiddenInitially
Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.abstract: default: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns false should still be in the viewstack so if a user navigates backwards it’ll appear

Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.name: removedAfterProceeding
Enums/ViewPersistance.html#/s:15DynamicW.abstract: default: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns true should be removed from the viewstack after the user progresses past it

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.name: navigationStack
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.abstract: navigationStack: Indicates a FlowRepresentable should be launched in a navigation stack of some kind (For example with UIKit this would use a UINavigationController)

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.name: modally
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.abstract: modally: Indicates a FlowRepresentable should be launched modally

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.name: default
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:15Dynamic.abstract: default: Indicates a FlowRepresentable can be launched contextually

Enums/PresentationType.html.name: PresentationType
Enums/PresentationType.html.abstract: PresentationType: An enum that indicates how FlowRepresentables should be presented

Enums/ViewPersistance.html.name: ViewPersistance
Enums/ViewPersistance.html.abstract: ViewPersistance: An enum that indicates how FlowRepresentables should be persist when in the view stack

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.name: thenPresent(_:staysInViewStack:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.abstract: thenPresent: A way of creating workflows with a fluid API. Useful for complex workflows with difficult requirements

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.name: thenPresent(_:staysInViewStack:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.abstract: thenPresent: A way of creating workflows with a fluid API. Useful for complex workflows with difficult requirements

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.name: thenPresent(_:staysInViewStack:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.abstract: thenPresent: A way of creating workflows with a fluid API. Useful for complex workflows with difficult requirements

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.name: abandon(animated:onFinish:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:15DynamicWorkfl.abstract: abandon: Called when the workflow should be terminated, and the app should return to the point before the workflow was launched

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: Value
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: Value: A typealias that is equivalent to the specialized type in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: value
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: value: The concrete value the node is holding onto

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: next
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: next: An optional reference to the next node in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: previous
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: previous: An optional reference to the previous node in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: traverse(_:)
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: traverse(distance): A method to move N spaces forwards or backwards through the nodes

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: traverse(_:)
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: traverse(Until): A method to move forward through the nodes until a precondition is met

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: traverseToEnd()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: traverseToEnd: A method to move forward through the nodes until there is no next

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: traverseToBeginning()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: traverseToBeginning: A method to move backwards through the nodes until there is no previous

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: position
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: position: A computed property that calculates a nodes position in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.name: copy()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:15Dynami.abstract: copy: Creates an exact replica of the node, including the next and previous values, this essentially deep copies the entire LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: startIndex
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: startIndex: The beginning index of the linked list (0 indexed)

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: endIndex
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: endIndex: The last index in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: description
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: description: A property indicating what to show when the LinkedList is printed.

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: isEmpty
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: isEmpty: A boolean to indicate whether the linked list contains any values

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: count
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: endIndex: The last index in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: first
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: first: The first node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: last
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: last: The last node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: init(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: init(elements): A LinkedList can be instantiated simply by providing the first node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: max()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: max: Returns the maximum value in the comparable LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: min()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: min: Returns the minimum value in the comparable LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: contains(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: contains: Returns a boolean indicating whether the given value is present in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: append(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: append: Appends a new node to the end of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: append(contentsOf:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: append(ContentsOf): Appends a collection of nodes to the end of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: insert(_:atIndex:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: insert: Inserts a new node at a specified location

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: insert(contentsOf:at:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: insert: Inserts a sequences of new nodes at a specified location

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: remove(at:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: remove(at): Removes a node at the specified index

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: removeFirst(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: removeFirst: Removes the first n nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: removeLast(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: removeLast: Removes the last n nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: popLast()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: popLast: Removes the last n nodes from the LinkedList and returns the removed concrete type

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: removeAll()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: removeAll: Removes all nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: swapAt(_:_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: swapAt: Swaps the concrete values of 2 nodes

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: replace(atIndex:withItem:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: replace: Replaces the concrete value of the node at the specified index

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: reverse()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: reverse: Reverse the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: sort(by:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: sort: Sorts the linkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html.name: Node
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html.abstract: LinkedList.Node: A type to hold onto elements in a LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: reversed()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: reversed: Return a new version of the LinkedList with all elements reversed

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: replacing(atIndex:withItem:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: replacing: Return a new version of the LinkedList with a specific element replaced

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: sorted(by:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: sorted: Return a new sorted version of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: dropFirst(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: dropFirst: Return a new version of the LinkedList without the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: dropLast(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: dropFirst: Return a new version of the LinkedList without the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: drop(while:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: drop(while): Return a new version of the LinkedList without the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: prefix(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: prefix(maxLength): Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: prefix(while:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: prefix(while): Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.name: suffix(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:15DynamicWork.abstract: suffix(maxLength): Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html.name: LinkedList
Classes/LinkedList.html.abstract: LinkedList: A sequence type used to create a doubly linked list

Classes.html#/s:15DynamicWorkflow14UIWor.name: UIWorkflowItem
Classes.html#/s:15DynamicWorkflow14UIWor.abstract: UIWorkflowItem: A subclass of UIViewController designed for convenience. This does NOT have to be used, it simply removes some of the overhead that normally comes with a FlowRepresentable.

Classes/Workflow.html.name: Workflow
Classes/Workflow.html.abstract: Workflow: A doubly linked list of AnyFlowRepresentable types. Can be used to create a user flow.
